item.title: Lineage 面临年内最大美国 IPO 后的首个盈利障碍
item.description: Lineage 公司在今年美国最大的首次公开募股中筹集了 51 亿美元，该公司的首份季报将是一次关键的考验，因为这家温控存储公司面临着潜在的食品供应需求疲软。【原文：Lineage Inc.’s first quarterly report after raising $5.1 billion in the year’s biggest US initial public offering will be a crucial test, as the temperature-controlled storage firm faces potentially weak demand for food supplies.】

item.title: 利比亚计划进行 2011 年内战以来的首次石油勘探招标
item.description: 利比亚正在计划自 2011 年内战以来的首次能源勘探合同招标，因为这个欧佩克成员国希望让因多年不稳定和停产而受到惊吓的石油巨头们回心转意。【原文：Libya is planning its first tender for energy exploration contracts since 2011’s civil war, as the OPEC member looks to bring back oil majors spooked by years of instability and production shutdowns.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德寻求更多有关 Grifols 关联方交易的信息
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司正在等待 Grifols SA 公司提供有关关联方交易的信息，以完成对该公司业务的尽职调查。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management is awaiting information from Grifols SA about related-party transactions as it seeks to complete its due diligence on the business, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Pimco 和 DoubleLine 借 Wamco 灾难之机抢夺资产
item.description: 长期以来，西海岸的债券公司一直遵守着一项非官方约定，即避免相互挖角。但在争取客户方面，所有的赌注都打消了。【原文：West Coast bond houses have long honored an unofficial pact that they would avoid aggressively poaching staff from one another. But when it comes to pursuing clients, all bets are off.】

item.title: 投资者为美国投票后股市波动性下降做好准备
item.description: 一些投资者押注，保护股票投资组合免受美国大选前后波动影响的竞争将逐渐减弱，这是在潜在的市场动荡事件发生后经常出现的一种模式。【原文：Some investors are betting that the race to protect stock portfolios from volatility around the US election will fade, a pattern that’s often seen following potentially market-moving events.】

item.title: 欧盟的约根森希望获得更便宜的能源，停止进口俄罗斯燃料
item.description: 丹-约根森（Dan Jorgensen）被任命为欧盟下一任能源主管，他承诺在欧盟向可持续经济转型的过程中，采取措施降低价格并停止进口俄罗斯化石燃料。【原文：Dan Jorgensen, designate as the European Union’s next energy chief, pledged measures to lower prices and end imports of Russian fossil fuels as the bloc pursues its transition to a sustainable economy.】

item.title: Blackstone 价值 370 亿美元的 Tac Opps 部门有了新老板
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 一家重要企业正在进行人事变动。【原文：A changing of the guard is underway at a key Blackstone Inc. business.】

item.title: 沃尔玛的 "解药"--被锁住的产品：手机钥匙
item.description: 沃尔玛公司（Walmart Inc. ）正在商店里测试一种技术，让人们可以用手机打开商品的安全锁，从而在不影响销售的情况下防止盗窃。【原文：Walmart Inc. is testing technology in stores that would let people open security locks for products from their cellphones, a bid to protect against theft without hindering sales.】

item.title: 大选悬而未决，特朗普媒体的分水岭时刻到来了
item.description: 特朗普媒体与科技集团公司（Trump Media & Technology Group Corp.从这一点来看，随着美国人周二前往投票站，这家亏损的社交媒体网站的关键时刻已经到来。【原文：The case for owning shares in Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. boils down to the political fortunes of its namesake. Going by that, the moment of truth for the loss-making social media site has arrived as Americans head to the polls Tuesday.】

item.title: Votorantim 探讨北美水泥部门的首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西企业集团 Votorantim SA 正在考虑对其北美水泥业务进行首次公开募股。【原文：Brazilian conglomerate Votorantim SA is considering an initial public offering of its North American cement business, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 支持者寻求现金，德国首次公开募股不惧经济低迷
item.description: 尽管欧洲最大的经济体令人担忧，但越来越多的德国企业正准备在未来几个月内上市，因为收购集团和企业面临着为投资者实现价值的压力。【原文：A growing number of German firms are gearing up to go public in the coming months despite worries over Europe’s largest economy, as pressure builds on buyout groups and corporations to realize value for investors.】

item.title: 美国服务业活动以 2022 年年中以来最快速度增长
item.description: 在招聘人数回升的推动下，10 月份美国服务业以两年多来最快的速度扩张。【原文：The US service sector expanded in October at the fastest pace in over two years, fueled by a pickup in hiring.】

item.title: 随着大选接近尾声，阿尔特币成为加密货币最大的风险交易品种
item.description: 在今年大部分时间里，比特币的表现普遍不佳，而在美国总统大选结束后，Doge 和 Solana 等较小的加密货币最终可能会受到最大的影响。【原文：After generally underperforming Bitcoin during much of this year, smaller cryptocurrencies such as Doge and Solana may end up having the most at stake following the conclusion of the US presidential election.】

item.title: 顾问称，投资者对哥伦比亚地区改革的担忧是错误的
item.description: 哥伦比亚三十年来最重大的宪法改革将以对投资者友好的方式进行，根据该计划背后的两位关键顾问的说法，这一改革不会导致预算赤字激增。【原文：Colombia’s most significant constitutional change in three decades will be done in an investor-friendly manner that won’t blow out the budget deficit, according to two key advisers behind the plan.】

item.title: 据说意大利忠利集团正在考虑收购美国信贷投资公司 MGG
item.description: 知情人士透露，意大利保险公司 Assicurazioni Generali SpA 正在考虑收购纽约信贷投资公司 MGG Investment Group，以拓展私人资产业务。【原文：Assicurazioni Generali SpA is considering a deal to acquire New York-based credit investment firm MGG Investment Group, people familiar with the matter said, as the Italian insurer looks to expand in the private asset business.】

item.title: 土耳其启动卢布互换以缓解受制裁挤压的贸易状况
item.description: 一家土耳其天然气贸易商正在开展货币兑换业务，以缓解俄罗斯和土耳其之间未经批准的贸易往来，这表明企业正在寻找创造性的方法来解决支付问题，同时为中间商创造有利可图的机会。【原文：A Turkish gas trader is starting a currency exchange business to ease unsanctioned trade between Russia and Turkey, showing firms are finding creative ways around payment issues while creating lucrative opportunities for middlemen.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚希望发行大额债券清偿国有企业债务
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚计划发行 9000 亿比尔（约合 74 亿美元）的债券，以清偿几家国有企业拖欠的债务，这些债务已使这个东非国家最大的贷款国陷入困境。【原文：Ethiopia plans to issue 900 billion birr ($7.4 billion) of bonds to settle debts owed by several government-owned enterprises that have hobbled the East African nation’s biggest lender.】

item.title: 美国人前往投票站选择下一任总统
超微面临退市，S&P 500 因审计师问题被除名
item.description: 超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.但在股价创下历史新高仅八个月后，投资者就开始质疑这家服务器制造商是否会被纳斯达克公司除名，并被赶出 S&P 500 指数。【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. started the year as a hot artificial intelligence trade. But just eight months after shares hit a record high, investors are asking whether the server maker will be delisted by Nasdaq Inc. and booted from the S&P 500.】

item.title: 足够冲泡 75 亿杯的茶叶堆积在东非
item.description: 三年前，作为世界上最大的茶叶生产国之一，肯尼亚为茶叶设定了最低价格，以避免茶农在供过于求的市场中蒙受损失。现在，肯尼亚被迫暂停这一计划，转而开始以低价清理大量库存。【原文：Three years ago, Kenya — one of the world’s biggest tea producers — set a minimum price for the commodity to cushion farmers from losses in an oversupplied market. Now, it’s been forced to suspend the plan and set about clearing a huge inventory at bargain rates instead.】

item.title: 新兴市场排名第一的对冲基金将获得更多不良债务收益
item.description: 在高收益基金中表现最好的对冲基金之一表示，在阿根廷和乌克兰等不同国家，推动高收益基金收益的不良债务反弹仍有上升空间。【原文：A distressed-debt rally driving gains in high-yield funds still has room to run in countries as diverse as Argentina and Ukraine, according to the hedge fund with the one of the best performances in the asset class.】

item.title: 乌干达将主要石油出口通道的股权目标提高至 52
item.description: 在为一个价值 50 亿美元的石油出口管道项目举债出现延误之后，乌干达正在采取措施增加该项目的股权投资。【原文：Uganda is taking steps to boost the equity investment in a $5 billion oil-export pipeline, following delays in raising debt for the project.】

item.title: KKR 在第一阶段招标后获得富士软体三分之一以上股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在私募股权公司完成第一阶段要约收购后，KKR & Co.已获得富士软公司超过三分之一的股份。【原文：KKR & Co. has secured more than one-third of Fuji Soft Inc. after the private equity firm completed the first stage of its tender offer, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The US stock market is unlikely to head into a bear market in the next 12 months, with a resilient economy continuing to support equities, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 德国商业银行出售 SRT，首席执行官启动释放资本计划
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）首席执行官贝蒂娜-奥尔洛普（Bettina Orlopp）正在努力释放资本，同时进行重大风险转移。【原文：Commerzbank AG is working on a significant risk transfer amid an effort by Chief Executive Officer Bettina Orlopp to unlock capital.】

item.title: 债务激增，沙特阿美面临 310 亿美元红利困境
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）将在明年初做出一个关键决定：是削减 310 亿美元的季度股息，冒着王国预算赤字恶化的风险，还是继续借贷以维持派息。【原文：Saudi Aramco will have a crucial decision to make early next year: Cut its $31 billion quarterly dividend and risk worsening the kingdom’s budget deficit, or keep borrowing to maintain the payout.】

item.title: 欧洲央行发现欧洲银行的商业房地产风险敞口 "明显恶化
item.description: 欧洲中央银行的研究人员在一项关于商业房地产与金融体系之间联系的研究中发现，欧元区银行对商业房地产投资者的未偿贷款约有 1.3 万亿欧元（14 亿美元），而且信贷质量 "明显恶化"。【原文：Banks in the euro region have about €1.3 trillion ($1.4 billion) in outstanding loans to commercial real estate investors and credit quality is “visibly deteriorating,” European Central Bank researchers found in a study of the links between CRE and the financial system.】

item.title: 西班牙银行洪灾风险为 200 亿欧元：西班牙国家银行
item.description: 据西班牙中央银行称，通过向家庭提供抵押贷款和向当地公司提供贷款，西班牙的贷款人在遭受致命洪水袭击的瓦伦西亚地区拥有约 200 亿欧元（约合 218 亿美元）的风险敞口。【原文：Lenders in Spain have an exposure of about €20 billion ($21.8 billion) to the Valencia area that has been hit by deadly floods through mortgages to households and loans to local companies, according to the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 山寨 ETF 正在渗入 "找人饲养 "的股票市场
item.description: 在华尔街的众多产品中脱颖而出并非易事。试想一下，在竞争日益激烈的投资行业中，当竞争对手推出股票代码惊人相似的仿冒产品时，基金经理们正竭力维护其原创 ETF 产品的所有权。【原文：Sticking out from the Wall Street crowd is no easy feat at the best of times. Now imagine the plight of money managers across the ever-competitive investment industry, who are struggling to assert ownership of their original ETF offerings as rival firms launch imitator products with strikingly similar tickers.】
